section.title: Features and Functionality
section.p: The following features and functionality have been added to :

dlentry.dd: If you have worked with Cloud Foundry before, will allow you to work in a familiar environment where instead of BOSH, uses Terraform, a service management command-line tool.

If you have worked with HPE Helion Stackato or with the HPE Helion Development Platform before, will allow you to work with , a new command-line administration utility that shares some functionality with Kato. For more information, see the . communicates with Consul instead of Cloud Controller and runs within the Docker overlay Virtual Extensible LAN (VXLAN).
